title: Regional Theater Gets a National Audience
sub_head: The creation of the National Theatre Network, a streaming platform for small troupes, will be a boon for companies and viewers alike.
body: Now that mass vaccination appears to be winding down the Covid-19 pandemic in America, how will our theaters respond to the prospect of reopening after going dark more than a year ago? Many of them have been streaming webcasts of their shows in lieu of performing them in front of live audiences, and most of the artistic directors to whom Iâ€™ve spoken in recent months have said the same thing: Even after resuming public performances, these companies plan to keep on making their productions available via streaming video.
